sentence:
Ms. PETTERSEN. Mr. Speaker, I rise today to recognize James Millard  for earning the Arvada Wheat Ridge Service Ambassadors for Youth Award.

James has overcome many challenges along his journey to success,  demonstrating perseverance at every step. Students who strive to make  the most of their education,…
